resources.string: Stream elements use a lot of battery
Full UI Acer Stream use a lot of battery.\nYou must delete and re-add your widgets after changing UI
Stream notifications use a lot of battery
AOSP dialer is faster but with less options
Lock type Stream will break widget refresh on desktop on reboot

If you want use breeze launcher and your status bar does not work, check "Launcher type stream".
Then change user interface in Settings/Application/UI to Acer_UI on your phone.
Enabling this will disable ANDROID type notifications.
To disable, uncheck and change user interface in Settings/Application/UI to Android_UI on your phone.
